Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the BE2-M17 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Expression of GTP cyclohydrolase, sepiapterin reductase, tyrosine hydroxylase, and aromatic acid decarboxylase was decreased in cells overexpressing wild-type SNCA.
Expression of the same genes was not significantly altered in cells overexpressing mutant SNCA.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple clonal lines were used for validation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed multiple times.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with vector alone were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Vector-only cell lines were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels within ±2.0 fold change compared to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels outside ±2.0 fold change compared to control.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the BE2-M17 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Expression of Nurr1 was reduced in cells overexpressing wild-type SNCA.
Expression of Nurr1 was not significantly altered in cells overexpressing mutant SNCA.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple clonal lines were used for validation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed multiple times.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with vector alone were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Vector-only cell lines were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Expression levels within ±2.0 fold change compared to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Expression levels outside ±2.0 fold change compared to control.

Material used.Description: The experiment was conducted using the BE2-M17 cell line.

Readout description.Result Description: Reduced expression of TH was seen in wild-type SNCA cell lines.
Expression of TH was not significantly altered in mutant SNCA cell lines.

Biological replicates.Description: Multiple clonal lines were used for validation.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was analyzed multiple times.

Basic positive control.Description: Cells transfected with vector alone were used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Vector-only cell lines were used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: t-tests were used for statistical analysis.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: Protein expression greater than 80% compared to control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: Protein expression less than 50% compared to control.
